comments:
I wonder if the NPE in the attached log is getting triggered more frequently in
the later versions of CDT.

IOW, it looks like a bug outside CDT, but CDT is more seriously affected than
before.

?yvind

Created an attachment (id=16416)
Shows NPE

See:


java.lang.NullPointerException
at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.InstructionPointerManager.addAnnotation(InstructionPointerManager.java:98)

at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.launch.LaunchView.openEditorForStackFrame(LaunchView.java:707)

at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.launch.LaunchView.showEditorForCurrentSelection(LaunchView.java:598)

Note that the only negative effects from a users point of view is the annoying
requester. Noise in PDE error log is a very minor issue.

Is there a way to disable the error log requester? 

After the 10th time it appears, it gets a bit boring. 

IMHO, the only people that care about this error are those that are a well aware
of the PDE error log.

Perhaps some less annoying way to flag a fresh error in the PDE error log?

If I could only google the preferences in Eclipse :-)

?yvind

This problem is especially annoying when debugging e.g. inside C++ STL libraries.

?yvind

This fix is in 3.0.1. The attached log file does not have any NPEs?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 68413 ***
